prompts.title: Intro block (auto)
prompts.prompt: Write an introductory paragraph about FIRSTNAME's work as a JOB. Also talk about FIRSTNAME's role within ORGANISATION.

prompts.title: Intro block 2 (auto)
prompts.prompt: Write an introductory paragraph about FIRSTNAME's work as a JOB. Describe their role at ORGANISATION and your relationship to them.

prompts.title: Intro block (custom)
prompts.prompt: Write an introductory paragraph about FIRSTNAME's work as a JOB using the following personaility traits: TRAITS.
prompts.description: Write 3 things that summarise John as a person.

prompts.prompt: Write an introductory paragraph about FIRSTNAME's work as a JOB using the following personaility traits. TRAITS.
